remarks: A version of ~ ac6s for finite sets.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 26-Jun-2009.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 29-Jan-2014.)
statement:
ac6sfi.1 $e |- ( y = ( f ` x ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
ac6sfi $p |- ( ( A e. Fin /\ A. x e. A E. y e. B ph ) -> E. f ( f : A --> B /\ A. x e. A ps ) ) $.
$d A f x $.
$d B f x y $.
$d f ph $.
$d ps y $.
